text:
Halle Berry and Alex Da Kid's relationship goes Instagram official

Halle Berry stunned fans with photos of her leg (and butt) revealing dress at the Kingsman premiere in London Monday, and she's grabbing attention again with a cuddly, black-and-white shot with her new beau.

Berry made her relationship with British music producer Alex Da Kid Instagram official Tuesday with the romantic pic.

My balance A post shared by Halle Berry (@halleberry) on Sep 19, 2017 at 11:00am PDT

In the photo's caption, Berry simply wrote, "My balance."

Alex Da Kid also posted the photo with an almost identical caption Tuesday.

My.....balance... A post shared by alexdakidofficial (@alexdakidofficial) on Sep 19, 2017 at 11:02am PDT

But is Berry, 51, really the 35-year-old's girlfriend?

In August, she told People that she was taking a break from dating after her divorce from French actor Olivier Martinez in 2016. The two split in 2015 after two years of marriage, and have a 3-year-old son together.

USA TODAY has reached out to Berry's reps for comment.
